subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Marissa Coleman scored a career-high 32 points, and her fellow senior Kristi Toliver added 27 on Friday night as No. 5 Maryland beat Boston College, 86-74.
snippet: Marissa Coleman scored a career-high 32 points, and her fellow senior Kristi Toliver added 27 on Friday night as No. 5 Maryland beat Boston College, 86-74.
